author: G Balachandar
text:
International passengers at the Chennai airport can expect a new shopping experience at the duty-free shop, as it is expected to soon start selling an extensive selection of brands and products at prices that match or better those at duty free shops at airports in Singapore or Dubai.

Flemingo, the Dubai-based duty free retailer who runs the store, is doubling the space of the store and bringing world class ambience and wider product range into the store. The revamped Flemingo Duty Free is expected to be opened over the next 2-3 months.

Pre-order items online

While the Chennai Duty Free shop is undergoing a makeover, it had introduced online pre-ordering service under which its digital shopping portal gives its buyers the option to browse its catalogue of products, pre-order items online, and collect the items at the dedicated duty free shop upon arrival or departure at the Chennai airport by showing the passport and boarding pass.
title: Duty-free store at Chennai airport revamped
